name: Vessel registration
description: Vessel not (or incorrectly) registered in a flag state or missing registration documentation

name: Licence and authorisation
description: Fishing without a valid licence/authorisation or permit issued by the flag State or the relevant coastal State

name: Activities with known IUU vessel(s)
description: Fishery related activity involving a vessel identified as engaged in IUU

name: Fish room and seawater tanks certificates
description: Not available, not valid or falsified fish room and seawater tanks certificates

name: Forced labour
description: Conducting fishing activities with the use of forced labour

name: Crew requirements
description: Conducting fishing activities without master on board or crew list not updated or not on board.

name: Other Authorisations and certification requirements
description: If the suspected infringement is related to authorisations and certification requirements but does not match any other category of this group

name: Quota and catch limits
description: Fishing without a quota or after attainment of catch limit

name: Other Catch and Effort restrictions
description: If the suspected infringement is related to Catch and Effort restrictions but does not match any other category of this group

name: Prohibited species or stock
description: Fishing prohibited species or stock: directed fishing of species or stock subject to moratorium or for which fishing is prohibited or requires a specific authorisation

name: Prohibited depth range
description: Fishing at a prohibited depth range

name: Closed area
description: Fishing in a closed or restricted area

name: Closed period
description: Fishing in a closed period or season

name: Other Fishing seasons, closed areas and prohibition of fishing
description: If the suspected infringement is related to Fishing seasons, closed areas and prohibition of fishing but does not match any other category of this group

name: Failure to ensure safety of officials
description: Failure to stop and manoeuvre, no or defective boarding ladder, failure to facilitate safe access of officials

name: Interference with officials or observers
description: Obstruction of the work of officials or observers in the exercise of their duties, intimidation or interfering with officials, failure to comply with official instructions

name: Absence of observer on board
description: Fishing without observer on board when mandatory

name: Tampering with evidence
description: Destroying evidence, interfering with evidence, concealing evidence

name: Fishing gear
description: Non compliant  gear (e.g. illegal mesh size, illegal attachments, absence or non conformity of selectivity device)

name: Prohibited or unauthorised fishing method
description: Use of prohibited or unauthorised fishing method (including use of prohibited or unauthorised fishing gear)

name: Marking and identification fishing gear or fishing device
description: Absence or non-conformity of identification of fishing gear or fishing device (marking, buys, etc..)

name: Deterrence devices
description: Absence or non-compliant use of deterrence devices  (e.g. ADDs)

name: Other Fishing gear or fishing method
description: If the suspected infringement is related to fishing gear or fishing method but does not match any other category of this group

name: Discard
description: Illegal discard of species subject to landing obligation (e.g., species under catch limits or with minimum size)

name: Catch retained
description: Retain on board, land, store or transport fish that should have been discarded at sea

name: Catch retained - species below MCRS
description: Retain on board, land, store or transport fish below MCRS not subject to landing obligation

name: Marketing
description: Marketing illegal fishery product

name: Marketing - Undersize fish subject to landing obligation
description: Marketing for direct human consumption of undersize fish subject to landing obligation

name: Marketing - Undersize fish not subject to landing obligation
description: Marketing of undersize fish not subject to landing obligation

name: Post harvesting operations involving prohibited species or stock
description: Retain on board, tranship, land, store, sale, display or offer for sale prohibited species

name: Marketing - Food safety
description: Marketing of fishery product not proper for human consumption or not compliant with the rules for food safety

name: Stowage
description: Stowage of catch not done according to the regulation (e.g separation of size classes)

name: Transhipment
description: Illegal or unauthorised transhipment operation

name: Weighing at landing
description: Absence or incorrect weighing of catches at landing (including sampling obligation)

name: Landing authorisation
description: Entrance and/or landing without prior authorisation

name: Designated port
description: Entrance, Landing or making use of other services in a non-designated port or in unauthorised place

name: Sales notes and take-over declaration
description: Absence or incorrect sales note or take-over declaration

name: Transport documents
description: Absence or incorrect transport documentation

name: Catch certificate for import-export
description: Absence or incorrect catch certificate

name: Traceability
description: Absence or incorrect information prohibiting to track the origin of the fishery product

name: Traceability - Labelling
description: Product labelling non-compliant with regulation

name: First sale
description: Marketing without mandatory first sale

name: Product presentation
description: Retain on board, land, store or commercialize a fish product in a not permitted presentation

name: Other Post harvesting operations at sea, land based operations
description: If the suspected infringement is related to Post harvesting operations at sea or land based operations but does not match any other category of this group

name: Electronic fishing logbook
description: Not equipped or not operational or failing to fulfil obligations of recording and reporting data related to fishing activities

name: Paper Fishing logbook
description: Not onboard or not kept updated or failing to fulfil obligations of recording and reporting data related to fishing activities

name: Departure declaration
description: Not recorded, misrecorded, not reported or not reported in due time

name: Entry or exit in/from zone
description: Not notified, not notified on time, incorrect notification

name: Fishing operation declaration
description: Not recorded, misrecorded, not reported or not reported in due time

name: Catch declaration - fish above minimum legal size/weight
description: Not recorded, misrecorded or not reported catch of fish above minimum legal size/weight

name: Catch declaration - fish below minimum legal size/weight
description: Not recorded, misrecorded or not reported catch of fish below minimum legal size/weight

name: Catch declaration - margin of tolerance
description: Difference between catch reported and landing exceeding the legal margin of tolerance

name: Catch certificate
description: Not recorded, misrecorded, not reported

name: Discards declaration
description: Not recorded, misrecorded, not reported (include species not subject to landing obligation, as well as exemptions for species object of landing obligation (e.g., survivability and De Minimis)

name: End of Fishing declaration
description: Not recorded, misrecorded, not reported or not reported in due time

name: Prior notification of arrival
description: Not submitted, not submitted on time or submitted incorrectly

name: Landing declaration
description: Not recorded, misrecorded, not reported or not reported in due time

name: Stowage plan
description: Absence or incorrect stowage plan

name: Declaration of arrival
description: Not recorded, misrecorded or not reported

name: Other fishing vessel recording and  reporting obligations
description: If the suspected infringement is related to fishing vessel recording and reporting obligations but does not match any other category of this group

name: Vessel Monitoring System (VMS)
description: Not equipped, not operational, tampering with equipment

name: Automatic Identification System (AIS)
description: Not equipped, not operational, tampering with equipment

name: Remote Electronic Monitoring (REM)
description: Not equipped, not operational, tampering with equipment

name: Vessel marking
description: Falsified or concealed  vessel's markings, identity or registration, failure to correctly mark a vessel

name: Grading device
description: Illegal grading device on board

name: Fish detection system
description: Illegal use of fish detection system (e.g. spotter aircraft)

name: Fish aggregation device
description: Illegal use of fish aggregation device

name: Vessel catch handling equipment
description: Non compliant equipment for water separation, grading, or processing
